oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Baboons are said to speak the Bushman language and to possess wives. Their use of Sso|oa, which informs them of matters otherwise unknown to them. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-24. 5924-5926, 5923 rev.-5925 rev.). ss'o |a
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baboons speak Bushman, and have wives
